attributes.review: i downloaded the app to give aid to the obese orange currently sitting in office but when i downloaded it my ENTIRE phone was wiped. when i contacted the services about why this happened they called me a fagg0t and told me to stop advocating for black lives if i were to support the fatty with a peanut sized d!ck. when i asked why i need to stop they said it goes against his religion.  😓😰😤🤬😾😾😾
attributes.title: TERRIBLE 😭😢🤬😤

attributes.review: An absolute abomination!! I got this app to support my top leader president Donald Trump in the blm movement but when I opened the app, all I saw was the word poopy all over my screen! 😱 It was so terrible I started seizing immediately and almost died. My mother took my phone to see what happened and had a heart attack 😔❤️❌ She’s still in this hospital to this day and may be in a comatose condition 😢
attributes.title: Terrible!

attributes.review: everytime i tried to sign in, it kept taking me Back to my home screen. LAter that day i Came bacK it would happen again. it’s really sad because in the area i LIVE in there are So MAny True Trump supportERs having the same issue... I bet you Bernie would never let something like this happen😌
attributes.title: Couldn’t even sign in

attributes.review: once i downloaded it i got a virus on my phone! sexual images started popping up out of nowhere and repeatedly asked me if i wanted to be trumps baby girl. he is a MARRIED MAN. i don’t think this is appropriate for children and people who are in relationships. took all of my personal information about my kids. i do not want donald trump looking at my kids.
attributes.title: unbelievable

attributes.review: The app had so many viruses. On top of that it made my phone very slow  to the point to where the app just crashed. It asked for too much personal information to the point where I felt unsafe to even be on it. I recommend using another app to get the latest news, this one isn’t worth your storage.
attributes.title: 🧚🏻‍♂️💫✨

attributes.review: I downloaded this app so i could learn more about my wonderful president mr. donald trump however after i downloaded it stuff started getting crazy. my camera roll was flooded with pictures of my beloved bob ross in captivity😾😡 i was told that in order to get him back i would need to stream be happy😻😻 so i did and it didn’t work i miss you bob
attributes.title: absolutely not😻

attributes.review: I sat for 2 hours wait for the app to boot up I opened and closed it many times and even re downloaded it. After it finally booted up the graphics were terrible and loading super slow and anything I interacted with would not load up. Very disappointed in out great presidents app.
attributes.title: Not worth the time spent loading

attributes.review: This app took a whole 3 days to download n while it was downloading it kept my phone glitch like crazy n Ik it’s from dis app cuz ever since I I pressed download my phone was becoming laggy and when when I noticed it finally downloaded it kept kicking me out of the app non stop n it made my phone over heat real quick
attributes.title: Bad experience

attributes.review: Do NOT download this app! It is the worst thing i have ever downloaded. It took forever to load, (several days). And once it finally did my phone got hacked! There was also this cheeto puff looking thing all over it? Not really sure what it was but I have nightmares of it now. It’s basically my sleep paralysis demon. Anyways, this is a terrible app and I hate it.
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!!

attributes.review: I got this app to hopefully keep up with the campaign details and of course show my support BUT THEN it glitches horribly and gives me black screen on multiple occasions. This needs to be removed IMMEDIATELY. Tbh I wouldn’t be surprised if there was malware involved, really should look into what you put out if it’s just gonna continue to respond like a broken Nintendo 3DS.
attributes.title: COMPLETE PAPERWEIGHT
